scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Audiovisual materials and photographs series primarily consists of photographs, from the mid 1960s through to the early 2000s, of Kentucky Association of Family and Consumer Sciences members and annual meetings. The bulk of the series consists of small format photographic prints, ink jet printer images, and digital photographs that were originally housed on compact disks. Also included is a microcasette audio recording of a former president of KAFCS reviewing duties for the incoming president and an educational film on vhs tape about careers in home economics.
